sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import Login from './components/Login'; import Signup from './components/Signup'; import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard'; import AboutUs from './components/AboutUs'; import ContactUs from './components/ContactUs'; import Profile from './components/Profile'; import AdminDashboard from './components/AdminDashboard'; import ProtectedRoute from './components/ProtectedRoute'; import BrowseProducts from './components/BrowseProducts'; import Sell from './components/Sell'; import PremiumProducts from './components/PremiumProducts'; import SellPremium from './components/SellPremium'; import UserUploads from './components/UserUploads'; // Import the new component import Navigation from './components/Navigation'; const App = () => { const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); window.location.href = '/'; // Redirect to the login page }; // Mock user ID, replace this with actual user ID from authentication const userId = 'mockUserId123'; // Replace with actual user ID return ( <Router> <Routes> <Route path="/" element={<Login />} /> <Route path="/signup" element={<Signup />} /> <Route path="/dashboard" element={<Dashboard handleLogout={handleLogout} />} /> <Route path="/about" element={<AboutUs handleLogout={handleLogout} />} /> <Route path="/contact" element={<ContactUs handleLogout={handleLogout} />} /> <Route path="/profile" element={<Profile handleLogout={handleLogout} />} /> <Route element={<ProtectedRoute isAdmin={true} />} /> <Route path="/sell" element={<Sell userId={userId} />} /> <Route path="/admin" element={<AdminDashboard />} /> {/* Use ProtectedRoute for Admin Dashboard */} <Route path="/browse-products" element={<BrowseProducts userId={userId} />} /> <Route path="/user-uploads" element={<UserUploads userId={userId} />} /> <Route path="/premium-products" element={<PremiumProducts />} /> <Route path="/sell-premium" element={<SellPremium username={username} />} /> </Routes> </Router> ); }; export default App;
